name: Divine Shape
description:
There is this place that people call the Dome. The Dome's only inhabitants supposedly worship mysterious objects of various geometric shapes. It is believed these objects have immense power. Your corporate masters sent you to this place in search of one such cube-shaped object. 

Find and obtain the Cube.

---

Hello hello! Divine Shape is a short first-person adventure game about exploring surreal spaces in search of a supposedly divine cube. 

Notes: 

- game's duration: ~15-25 minutes

- the game is not a horror even though it has horror elements, don't expect major spooks / screamers 

- only mouse+keyboard supported controls wise, sorry 

WARNING: the game has flashing effects and text can be hard to read for some people, please be careful if you are eye sensitive. 

---
